DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate effect olive oil phonophoresis chronic law back pain female athlete .
DOC.brief_title: Olive Oil Phonophoresis Chronic Low Back
DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 60 female patient suffer chronic low back pain . study run single blind mode patient keep unaware treatment . The duration treatment 10 day . patient assign randomly olive oil placebo group . every day , take phonophoresis low back use phonophoresis gel placebo olive oil treatment 10 day . questionnaire fill baseline visit day 10. side effect drug technique record
DOC.criteria: Young female athlete suffer low back pain three month Underlying systematic visceral disease Specific condition neoplasm fracture , spondylolisthesis Previous low back surgery Pregnancy
